article_title: Senate Democrats introduce legislation to repeal Obamacare “Cadillac Tax”
article_text:
The proposal would eliminate controversial tax on high-cost, employer-sponsored health plans

Unions, employers, insurers and benefits groups support the proposal

But killing the tax would leave a $98 billion revenue shortfall

article_metadata.title: Senate Democrats introduce legislation to repeal Obamacare “Cadillac Tax” | McClatchy DC

og.description: - The call to repeal one of the Affordable Care Act's most controversial provisions got louder on Thursday when a group of prominent Democratic senators introduced legislation to abolish the so-called "Cadillac Tax" on high-cost, employer-sponsored health plans.
